questions.question: Set in the East Blue, this arc features Luffy's first encounter with a Marine Captain known for his iron mace. What is...?
This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates participating in a gladiator-style tournament on an island ruled by a Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This technique, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows the user to create and manipulate poison. What is...?
This ability allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will. What is...?
This technique, used by Zoro, involves the use of three swords at once, including one in the mouth. What is...?
This chief of staff of the Revolutionary Army is known for his flame powers and is a sworn brother to the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a reindeer with the ability to transform into different forms using the Human-Human Fruit. Who is...?
This character, a former Revolutionary Army commander, is known for his ability to create destructive earthquakes with the Gura Gura no Mi. Who is...?
